name: CSS

info:
## MQTT broker
The Aedes MQTT broker is started on port 1883 using this custom node module.

name: MQQT Subscriber
info:
## MQTT subscriber

MQTT subscriber which subscribes to the topic `worklet/control`.
When a new message is published to this topic, the content of the message is sent as `msg.payload` to the next node in the flow (a switch).

name: Control switch
info:
## Control switch
This control switch, which immediately follows the MQTT subscriber, is used to determine which flow to run, depending on the message contained in `msg.payload`.

info:
## Set grant info
This change node defines the remaining relevant grant information, and copies the grant periods set in last node.

name: Hent datoer
info:
## Get dates

This change node gets the values for `lastRunDate` and `lastRunStartDate` from their respective global variables stored in file.

name: Formatr dato
info:
## Format dates

This change node utilizes JSONata to determine a new `startDate` and `endDate`. 

The `startDate` is set depending on the boolean `lastRunSuccess`, and is set to `lastRunDate` if last run was successful. If not, it will set the `startDate` to the starting date of the last run `lastRunStartDate`.
The `endDate` is always set to yesterdays date - this allows future runs to always use the `lastRunDate` as `startDate`.

In both cases, the JSONata functions `$toMillis` and `$fromMillis` are first utilized format the date from `YY/MM/DD` (as stored in files) to `DD/MM/YY` (as used in WorkLet web interface). Then, they are used to calculate yesterdays date by retracting 86400000 miliseconds (24 hours) from todays date (`$now`).

name: LastRunSuccess?
info:
## LastRunSuccess?
This change node checks the global variable `statusCode` and sets the boolean variable `LastRunSuccess` to `true` if the status code is `0`, and otherwise to `false`.

name: Find filnavn
info:
## Define file name
This JS snippet utilizes the JavaScript date function `toDateString()` as well as some string manipulation to define the name of the JSON file which will be downloaded from Worklet web interface.

The name defined is later used to find and read the downloaded file, as the actual file name cannot be set when downloading, nor can it be retrieved as the download is in progress. Therefore, the name must be determined manually to match the naming procedure of Worklet web interface.

name: Findes filen?
info:
## Check for file
This JS snippet utilizes global modules `FS` and `Path` to check if the receipt JSON file already exists, or needs to be downloaded.

## Check for file - switch
This switch, which succeeds the JS snippet which determines receipt file existance, is used to skip the download of receipts if they already exist (they shouldn't!).

name: Slet JSON fil
info:
## Delete JSON file

This JS snippet utilizes the FS module to delete the JSON file after it has been read to memory.

name: St msg.receipts
info:
## Set msg.receipts

This change node sets msg.receipts = payload.kvitteringer (which contains an array of receipts), and deletes the payload afterwards.

name: St referencer
info:
## St referencer

In this change node, CSS selectors for Worklet web interface (https://workletnew.snapp.dk/) are set for use in the PupController JSON file.

name: Set pup commands

rules.to: [	    {	        "action": "launch",	        "parameters":	        {	            "headless": false,	            "slowMo": 50,	            "ignoreHTTPSErrors": true,	            "defaultViewport": null	        }	    },		    {	        "action": "goto",	        "url": selectors.worklet.url	    },	    	    {	        "action": "type",	        "path": selectors.worklet.loginUser,	        "input": workletUser	    },		    {	        "action": "type",	        "path": selectors.worklet.loginPass,	        "input": workletPass	    },	    	    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.loginButton	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.datePickerFrom	    },		    {	        "action": "type",	        "path": selectors.worklet.datePickerActive,	        "input": startDate,	        "clear": true	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.header	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.datePickerTo	    },		    {	        "action": "type",	        "path": selectors.worklet.datePickerActive,	        "input": endDate,	        "clear": true	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.header	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "isDownload": true,	        "path": selectors.worklet.downloadButton	    },	    {	        "action": "close"	    }	    	]

info:
## Set pup commands

This change node sets the automation flow JSON needed in PupController API. The flow is hard-coded with variable references to the CSS selectors defined in the preceeding node.

name: Personlig tillgsprocenter

rules.to: $.payload ~> |$.persondata|(		$tillaegsprocent_split := personligtillaegsprocent	    ~> $replace("Personlig tillgsprocent\tGyldig fra\tGyldig til\tAjourfringsdato\n", "")	    ~> $split("\n");	{		"personligtillaegsprocent": $tillaegsprocent_split #$i .{		    "dato_fra": ($tillaegsprocent_split[$i]	        ~> $split("\t"))[1]	        ~> $toMillis('[D01]-[M01]-[Y0001]')	        ~> $fromMillis('[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]'),		    "dato_til": ($tillaegsprocent_split[$i]	        ~> $split("\t"))[2]	        ~> $toMillis('[D01]-[M01]-[Y0001]')	        ~> $fromMillis('[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]'),		    "tillaegsprocent": ($t := (($tillaegsprocent_split[$i]	        ~> $split("\t"))[0]	        ~> $replace("%", "")	        ~> $replace("Ingen resultater fundet", "0"));	          ($t = "" ? 0 : $number($t)))	    }		}	)|

name: Sager

rules.to: $.payload ~> |$.persondata|(		$sager_split := sager	    ~> $replace("\n", "")	    ~> $replace("\t\t", "\t")	    ~> $substringAfter("\t")	    ~> $split("\t");	{	    "sager": $sager_split #$i .(		        /* Hvis kolonne-antal ndrer sig, breaker denne kode */		        $i % 5 = 0 and $i != 0 ?	        {	            "titel": $sager_split[$i],	            	            "type": $sager_split[$i+1],		            "fra": $sager_split[$i+2]	                ~> $toMillis('[D01]-[M01]-[Y0001]')	                ~> $fromMillis('[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]'),		            "til": $sager_split[$i+3]	                ~> $toMillis('[D01]-[M01]-[Y0001]')	                ~> $fromMillis('[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]'),		            "bevilling": ($sager_split[$i+4] = "Bevilget")	        })		    }	)|

name: Kontroller KP data ud fra regelst

rules.to: payload @$p.	(	$respectsRule := function($rule, $value)	{	    $rule.operator = "!null" ?	        $value != null	    :	    $value = null ?	        false	    :	    $rule.operator = "<" ?	        $value < $rule.value	    :	    $rule.operator = ">" ?	        $value > $rule.value	    :	    $rule.operator = "==" ?	        $value = $rule.value	    :	    $rule.operator = "!=" ?	        $value != $rule.value	    :	    $rule.operator = "contains" ?	        ($contains($string($rule.value), $string($value)))	    :	    $rule.operator = "!contains" ?	        ($contains($string($rule.value), $string($value)) ? false : true)	};	{	    "borger": $p.cpr,		    "regelbrud":	        rules @$r.	        (	            $respectsRule($r, $data := $lookup($p.persondata, $r.variable)) = false ?	            {	                "rule": $r.name,	                "description": $r.description,	                "objectValue": $data,	                "operator": $r.operator,	                "expectedValue": $r.value,	                "isRespected": $respectsRule($r, $data)	            }	        )	}	)

name: Fjern borgere som ikke er berettiget
Kontroller sager

rules.to: $.payload ~> |$.persondata|(		$sagForeligger := function($type, $titel)	{	    sager [	        ($type = 'A' ?	            type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains($titel)	        and 	            titel ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("fod")	            :	            type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains($titel))	    and	        $millis() > (fra ~> $toMillis)	    and	        (til ? $millis() < (til ~> $toMillis) : true)	    and	        bevilling	    ] ?	        true : false	};		{		    "udvidetHelbredstillaeg": $sagForeligger('A', 'udvidet helbredstill'),	    "almHelbredstillaeg": $sagForeligger('B', 'almindeligt helbredstill'),	    "helbredskort": $sagForeligger('B', 'gskort')		}		)|

name: [E] Download fakturaer for den bestemte tidsperiode
Find bevilling + sag gldende for hver behandling

rules.to: $.payload ~> | $.faktura.behandlinger |	(		    $uid := uid;	    $fid := fid;	    $faktura := $$.payload.faktura[id = $fid];	    $borger := $$.payload[cpr = $faktura.patientCPR];	    $type := type;		{	    "bevilget": type = 'A' ?	                    ($borger.persondata.bevilling ?	                        true : $borger.persondata.sager	                                [  	                                    (type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("udvidet helbredstill"))	                                and	                                    ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) > (fra ~> $toMillis)	                                and	                                    (til ? ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) < (til ~> $toMillis) : true)	                                and	                                    bevilling = true	                                ]	                                    ~> $exists ? true : false)	                :	                    ($borger.persondata.sager	                        [	                            (type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("almindeligt helbred")	                        or	                            type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("gskort"))	                        and	                            ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) > (fra ~> $toMillis)	                        and	                            (til ? ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) < (til ~> $toMillis) : true)	                        and	                            bevilling = true	                        ]	                            ~> $exists ? true : false),	                                	    "sag": $borger.persondata.sager	                [	                    titel ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("fod")	                and	                    ($type = 'A' ?	                        (type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("udvidet helbred"))	                    :	                        (type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("almindeligt helbredstill")	                    or	                        type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("gskort")))	                and	                    ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) > (fra ~> $toMillis)	                and	                    (til ? ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) < (til ~> $toMillis) : true)	                and	                    bevilling = true	                ]		})|

rules.to: $.payload ~> | $.faktura |	(		    $id := id;	    $borger := $$.payload[faktura.id = $id];	    $dato := dato;		{		    "_personligtillaegsprocent": $borger.persondata.personligtillaegsprocent [	        ($dato ~> $toMillis) > (dato_fra ~> $toMillis)	    and	        (dato_til ~> $boolean ? ($dato ~> $toMillis) < (dato_til ~> $toMillis) : true)	    ],		    "_helbredstillaegsprocent": $borger.persondata.helbredstillaegsprocent [	        ($dato ~> $toMillis) > (dato_fra ~> $toMillis)	    and	        (dato_til ~> $boolean ? ($dato ~> $toMillis) < (dato_til ~> $toMillis) : true)	    ]		})|

name: Rules JS

rules.to: [	    {	        "uid": "formuegraense",	        "name": "Formue",	        "variable": "formue",	        "operator": "<",	        "value": 93000,	        "type": "number",	        "description": "Borgerens formue skal flge denne regel",	        "error": "Borgerens formue bryder formue-reglen"	    },	    {	        "uid": "formueoplyst",	        "name": "Formue",	        "variable": "formue",	        "operator": "!null",	        "value": true,	        "type": "bool",	        "description": "Borgerens formue skal vre oplyst til UDK",	        "isSystemRule": true	    }	]

$.payload.rules ~> | $ |		type = "bool" ?	(	    value = true ?	    ({	            "isBool": true,	            "boolValue": true	    }) :	    ({	            "isBool": true	    })		) :		type = "number" ?	    ({	            "isNumber": true	    })	|

$.payload.rules ~> | $ |		operator = "==" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsEqualTo": true	    }) :		operator = "!=" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsNotEqualTo": true	    }) :		operator = "<" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsLessThan": true	    }) :		operator = ">" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsGreaterThan": true	    }) :		operator = "contains" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsContains": true	    }) :		operator = "!contains" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsDoesNotContain": true	    }) :		operator = "!null" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsNotNull": true	    })	|

({	            "value": true,	            "isBool": true,	            "boolValue": true	    }) :	    ({	            "value": false,	            "isBool": true	    })		) :		type = "number" ?	    ({	            "isNumber": true	    })	|

$.payload.rules ~> | $ |		operator = "==" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsEqualTo": true	    }) :		operator = "!=" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsNotEqualTo": true	    }) :		operator = "<" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsLessThan": true	    }) :		operator = ">" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsGreaterThan": true	    }) :		operator = "contains" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsContains": true	    }) :		operator = "!contains" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsDoesNotContain": true	    }) :		operator = "!null" ?	    ({	            "operatorIsNotNull": true	    })	|

Tilskudssatser

name: Fakturaer
template:
Fakturaer
Automatiseret behandling af WorkLet fakturaer

Nr du har godkendt loginoplysninger, forretningsregler samt tilskudssatser, kan du her sge efter ubehandlede fakturaer. Robotten henter automatisk fakturaer fra WorkLet og beregner anbefalede handlinger baseret p forretningsreglerne samt tilskudssatserne fra Danmark.
